abstract: The Federal Reserve plans to hold three public hearings on whether the benefits of Capital One’s purchase of ING Direct USA outweigh the risks of letting a too-big-to-fail bank get bigger.
snippet: The Federal Reserve plans to hold three public hearings on whether the benefits of Capital One’s purchase of ING Direct USA outweigh the risks of letting a too-big-to-fail bank get bigger.
lead_paragraph: 6:27 p.m. | Updated with Capital One statement

headline.main: Fed to Hold Hearings on Capital One’s Deal for ING Direct USA

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
